column5: With the warm weather I decided to bring my video camera out on a few brookie trips in the last week.  I made a video of the bit of footage I took.  Some of it's pretty goofy.  Hope you enjoy! Spring Specks
Nice Doc !!
Nice job. I got mine this weekend
very nice...my fave time of the year!

Love it !  Thanks for sharing .. just when I was getting over the hardwater season ... and gettin ready for ice out specks ... one of these days I'll find me a little back woods lake like that within 5 hours of the big smoke
within in 5 hours?? Wow!  I can help with that!
Bring it on
we still got two feet of ice!?
WOW  :worthy:
Well done Doc.  What software did you use?!
Nice vid, thanks!
any of my videos are just done on that free software that comes with windows...  Windows Live Movie or something it's called.    Thanks for the comments guys.
if thats a question then, north of town we sure do...likely east too
Great video!  Thanks for sharing.  Man, that looks like a good time!
Nice job Doc, that vid just got me fired up for soft water Specs....Soon enough I'll get my fill.
Nice specks and great video!

On a side note based on the title I was expecting something from last year. Open water in a canoe with the birds chirping and the sun shining.  I guess "spring" in the Soo means anything above minus 10.
Gem of a vid report.  What a great day of specks.
Spring is the day we start losing snow instead of gaining it! By the time the snow is gone, it's almost summer!
Cool deal looks like a great rip with friends.  Art
looks like a great day fishin,
Nice video. Thanks for sharing
